lines.text:
[singing and swinging in his cage]
I'm a tweet wittle birdie in a guilded cage/ Tweety's my name, but I don't know my age/ I don't have to worry and that is that/ I'm safe in there from that ole puddy tat.
[stops singing and swinging and sees Sylvester]
I tawt I taw a puddy tat.
I did! I did! I did taw a puddy tat.

[after he smacks Sylvester's hand when he tries to catch Tweety]
Oh no, you don't! It's a good thing I kept my eye on you, you sneakin' feline. And as for you, little birdie, I'd better put you in a safer place.
[he hangs Tweety's cage on a celing hook]
There ya are. That oughta do it.
